---
listing:
  id: sample-listings
  field-display-names:
    categories: "Research Interest"
  contents: posts/teaching/*/*.qmd  # 子目录储存 子目录文件
  sort: "date desc"  # 按日期降序排序
  type: grid  # 默认的博客样式列表
  categories: unnumbered  # #cloud启用分类过滤 展示为词云
  sort-ui: false  # 启用排序功能
  grid-columns: 6
  grid-item-border: false
  filter-ui: false  # 启用筛选功能
  fields: [title, image, categories]  # 显示日期、标题、阅读时间、描述和分类
  image-placeholder: "/path/to/default-image.jpg"  # 如果没有图片则显示默认图片
  
#feed: true  # 启用 RSS 源生成
title-block-banner: false  # 关闭标题块横幅
#description: "A collection of blog posts about various topics."
format:
  html:
    page-layout: full  # 页面全宽布局
    grid:
      body-width: 1000px  # 正文宽度
      margin-width: 200px  # 页边距
    css: 
      - css/teaching.css
      - css/people.css
---
